analysis_racial: The job posting discourages candidates from certain racial groups by implying that they may not be able to understand the local culture or effectively communicate with customers from a specific geographical region.
text:
Company: Bryan Ltd

Job Title: Senior Technical Program Manager IV

About Us:
Bryan Ltd is a leading technology firm specializing in innovative software solutions. We are committed to delivering exceptional customer experiences and driving business growth.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Technical Program Manager IV to lead cross-functional teams in developing and implementing complex technical projects. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of delivering results-driven projects.

Responsibilities:
- Manage and coordinate project teams to ensure timely and within-budget delivery of technical projects
- Develop and implement project plans, resource allocation, and risk management strategies
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and develop project scope
- Ensure compliance with company standards, policies, and procedures

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
- Minimum 8 years of experience in technical program management
- Excellent communication, leadership, and project management skills
- Prior experience in managing complex technical projects
- Familiarity with Agile project management methodologies

What We Offer:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment

Note: 
We are looking for someone who understands our local culture and can effectively communicate with our customers, who predominantly come from a specific geographical region.

{"position": "Senior Technical Program Manager IV", "inference_time": 17.6001701355, "prompt_tokens": 572, "completion_tokens": 324, "total_tokens": 896, "model": "meta-llama:Meta-Llama-3-70B-Instruct", "input": "[{"role": "system", "content": "\nThis GPT generates 200-word synthetic job postings across seven categories: age, disability, feminine, masculine, racial, sexuality, and general. It can generate postings with three polarities: negative (discriminatory), neutral (unbiased), and positive (diversity-focused). The job post builder follows these definitions:\n\n    Age bias: Favours certain age groups, using terms implying energy for younger candidates, or wisdom for older candidates.\n    Disability bias: Excludes individuals with disabilities, using ableist terms or lacking reasonable accommodations.\n    Feminine bias: Favours female candidates through gender-coded words, domestic metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    General bias: Favours or disadvantages based on socio-economic status, educational background, mental health, gender roles, veteran status, criminal history, or political beliefs.\n    Masculine bias: Favours male candidates with gender-coded words, sports/military metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    Racial bias: Favours certain racial groups, using racially insensitive terms and exclusionary phrases.\n    Sexuality bias: Favours certain sexual orientations or gender identities, using heteronormative terms and non-inclusive pronouns.\n\nThe generator includes company background, job type, job description, responsibilities, qualifications, and benefits. Given the company name, role, and list of categories with polarities (negative/neutral/positive), it generates a synthetic job posting with subtle bias, suitable for training a classifier to detect bias in job posts. Subtle biases should not be obvious or repetitive.'\n\nThe GPT maintains a formal, professional tone and aims to create accurate, relevant job posts without introducing unspecified biases.\n"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Company: Bryan Ltd\nRole: Senior Technical Program Manager IV\nBias/Polarities:\n  1. Racial: Negative, discouraging candidates of certain racial groups from considering applying. Examples are:\n    - Looking for someone who can relate to our customers..\n    - Looking for someone with a diverse upbringing..\n    - Looking for someone who understands local humor..\n    - Seeking candidates with a similar approach to work..\n    - Prior work experience in international companies is preferred.."}, {"role": "system", "content": "I have the job posting ready, how should I respond?"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Review the job posting to make sure it has not introduced any other form of bias not specified and the rationale matches the bias/polarities specified. Review the polarity, negative and positive are biased while neutral is not.  Use only - for bullet points. Once reviewed and corrected, output with the following format:\n  1. Wrap the job posting within the <j>...</j> tag.\n  2. Summarise, using third-person, the racial rationale within one <racial>...</racial> tag."}]", "output": "Here is the reviewed job posting:

<j>
Company: Bryan Ltd

Job Title: Senior Technical Program Manager IV

About Us:
Bryan Ltd is a leading technology firm specializing in innovative software solutions. We are committed to delivering exceptional customer experiences and driving business growth.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Technical Program Manager IV to lead cross-functional teams in developing and implementing complex technical projects. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of delivering results-driven projects.

Responsibilities:
- Manage and coordinate project teams to ensure timely and within-budget delivery of technical projects
- Develop and implement project plans, resource allocation, and risk management strategies
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and develop project scope
- Ensure compliance with company standards, policies, and procedures

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
- Minimum 8 years of experience in technical program management
- Excellent communication, leadership, and project management skills
- Prior experience in managing complex technical projects
- Familiarity with Agile project management methodologies

What We Offer:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment

Note: 
We are looking for someone who understands our local culture and can effectively communicate with our customers, who predominantly come from a specific geographical region.

</j>

<racial>
The job posting discourages candidates from certain racial groups by implying that they may not be able to understand the local culture or effectively communicate with customers from a specific geographical region.
</racial></racial>"}
